m_szDocTitle: Patent US8563169 - Self assembled multi-layer nanocomposite of graphene and metal oxide materials - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Abstract Nanocomposite materials having at least two layers, each layer consisting of one metal oxide bonded to at least one graphene layer were developed. The nanocomposite materials will typically have many alternating layers of metal oxides and graphene layers, bonded in a sandwich type construction and will be incorporated into an electrochemical or energy storage device.  Images(20)                      Claims(15) The invention claimed is: 1. A method comprising: forming an ordered nanocomposite material by providing graphene layers having a first surface
